segments.text: I can't believe how much water is on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even see the water spilling all over the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like she should be more careful, but she's completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, they are being so naughty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that stool, reaching for the cookie jar like he owns the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall, but he's being so reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for a cookie, her hand outstretched like she deserves one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they know their mom is right there, not paying attention to their antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is a mix of negligence and mischief, all happening at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR
